programme.title: Le dernier gang
programme.desc: Au milieu des années 1970, Simon et ses copains, tous nés à Belleville, à Paris, dévalisent au culot de modestes agences bancaires. Quelques ratés et succès plus tard, ils basculent dans le grand banditisme et se font connaître sous le nom du Gang des postiches. C'est lors d'un braquage que Simon remarque Julie, dont il tombe amoureux. Eprise également, cette dernière accepte de partager sa vie.

programme.title: Little Zombies
programme.desc: Un jour, quatre adolescents se rencontrent par hasard dans un crématorium. En fait, Hikari, Ikuko, Ishi et Takemura viennent tous de perdre leurs parents. Ils devraient être tristes, pourtant ils ne pleurent pas. Dépourvus de toute émotion, ces quatre jeunes décident alors de monter un groupe de rock explosif afin de donner un nouveau sens à leur vie.

programme.title: Lucky Strike
programme.desc: Jung-man, qui doit so'ccuper de sa mère malade, gagne modestement sa vie en faisant le ménage dans un sauna. Tout bascule quand il s'empare d'un gros sac de marque, trouvé dans une consigne du vestiaire et contenant une importante somme d'argent. De son côté, Tae-young, un agent des douanes, ne sait pas comment régler la dette qu'il a contractée auprès de monsieur Park, un impitoyable criminel. Mi-ran, régulièrement battu par son mari violent, ne sait pas comment faire pour s'éloigner de cet homme dangereux.

programme.title: True Blood
programme.sub-title: S1 E7 Tout feu tout flamme

programme.title: Cowboys
programme.desc: Un soir, Josie, surnommée Joe, révèle à son père Troy qu'elle n'est pas seulement le garçon manqué qu'il croyait, mais un véritable garçon enfermé dans un corps de fille de 11 ans. Si Troy, désemparé, comprend son enfant, sa femme Sally n'accepte pas le changement d'identité de sa fille. Un matin, Troy, séparé de sa femme, part sans avertissement avec Joe en randonnée dans les montagnes sauvages du Montana. Les deux veulent expérimenter la vie à la belle étoile des cowboys d'autrefois. Croyant à un kidnapping de la part de Troy, Sally alerte la police.

programme.title: Mon frère
programme.desc: Alors que son père vient de mourir, le jeune Andy est confié à la garde de sa grand-mère. Pendant ce temps, Teddy, son frère aîné, accusé d'avoir tué leur père, un personnage violent, est placé dans un centre éducatif fermé, dans l'attente de son jugement. L'adolescent découvre un milieu violent, au sein duquel les éducateurs, parmi lesquels Igor, tentent de canaliser l'énergie des jeunes gens par le sport. Enzo, l'un des jeunes pensionnaires, se montre particulièrement agressif avec Teddy.

programme.title: Pause
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Dévoilées
programme.desc: En 1970, Isabelle Sauser, 24 ans, vient d'accompagner son mari Laurent à l'aéroport lorsqu'elle apprend, deux heures plus tard, que l'avion de celui-ci vient de s'écraser. En 2018, Isabelle vit avec sa petite-fille de 21 ans, Anaïs, en Suisse. Un jour, elle l'aperçoit dans un train, entièrement voilée. Sans oser en parler à Anaïs, elle prévient aussitôt Léa. Laquelle saute dans un avion pour tenter de comprendre la conversion de sa fille, en pleine radicalisation. Si Isabelle refuse de confronter Anaïs à sa découverte par crainte de la faire fuir, cette conversion fait resurgir les fantômes de son passé.

programme.title: Le temps des égarés
programme.desc: Sira travaille comme traductrice pour l'Ofpra, l'organisme français qui gère les demandes d'asile. Sans scrupules, elle profite de sa position pour extorquer des fonds aux réfugiés qui passent par elle. En échange, elle leur propose un récit de vie qui convaincra à coup sûr les autorités. Un jour, elle trouve devant chez elle une petite Africaine dont le père a été arrêté. De son côté, Abdul a fui l'Irak et les combattants de Daesh. Il arrive en France dans un container avec d'autres clandestins et rejoint Jean-Paul, un ami photographe, qui accepte de l'accueillir le temps de ses démarches.

programme.title: Pas son genre
programme.desc: Clément Le Guern vient de quitter sa compagne. Auteur d'essais reconnu et professeur de philosophie, Clément, très parisien, apprend avec effroi qu'il est muté à Arras. Heureusement pour lui, son emploi du temps lui permet de passer la moitié de sa semaine à Paris. Mais, dans un salon de coiffure d'Arras, il rencontre Jennifer, qui s'occupe de lui. Clément est sous le charme de cette jeune femme qui lui résiste.

programme.title: Le vilain
programme.desc: Mme Thomas, vieille dame harcelée par des promoteurs véreux qui tentent de lui racheter sa maison, est sûre d'être maudite par Dieu. Elle voudrait mourir, mais ne tombe jamais malade et n'est jamais blessée. Quand son fils, qu'elle n'avait pas vu depuis vingt ans, ressurgit, elle comprend la raison de cette punition divine. Ce dernier est en effet un truand qui a toujours fait le mal autour de lui. Elle va essayer de le changer..

programme.title: Thalasso
programme.desc: Cinq ans après avoir été kidnappé, l'écrivain Michel Houellebecq doit prendre soin de sa santé vacillante après trop d'excès de boisson et se rend dans un centre de thalassothérapie. Les soins, l'interdiction de fumer et le régime sans alcool obligatoires ne l'enchantent guère. Tout comme l'acteur Gérard Depardieu, patient également, et avec lequel il se lie d'amitié. Ensemble, ils boivent en cachette, se racontent des choses intimes et parlent religion, philosophie et politique. Leur séjour est chamboulé quand des amis de l'écrivain lui demandent un service.

programme.title: Narco
programme.desc: Gustave Klopp, surnommé "Gus", s'endort n'importe où et n'importe quand. Un handicap qui l'empêche de travailler. Son épouse Pam, qui tient un institut de beauté, ne supporte plus de le voir traîner avec son meilleur ami Lenny Bar. Gus décide alors d'entamer une thérapie de groupe. Son psy Samuel Pupkin découvre alors que Gus fait des rêves incroyables où il devient un superhéros invincible et vengeur.

programme.title: Fils de plouc
programme.desc: A Bruxelles, Issachar et Zabulon deux frères d'une vingtaine d'années, vivent encore chez leur mère, Cachemire. Leur manque de bon sens les amène à commettre bêtise sur bévue, au grand désespoir de Cachemire, qui supporte de moins en moins leur stupidité. Elle leur confie pourtant la garde de son chien, Jacques-Janvier le temps de quelques promenades. Au cours de l'une d'entre elles, les frères laissent l'animal mordre un enfant avant de prendre la fuite et de trouver refuge dans une épicerie, qu'ils tentent maladroitement de cambrioler, avant d'être arrêtés par le vigile du magasin.

programme.title: Belgica
programme.desc: Au début des années 2000, à Gand, Jo vient d'ouvrir un bar, le Belgica. Son frère aîné, Franck, qui se sent un peu enfermé dans sa vie de mari et jeune père, propose à Jo de l'aider dans la gestion de l'établissement. Il commence à faire venir des musiciens dans le bar, qui connait vite un grand succès auprès de la clientèle locale. Si le lieu est réputé pour son ambiance survoltée, l'alcool et la drogue y circulent beaucoup, provoquant des dérapages.

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Talk-show.

programme.title: Billie: In Search of Billie Holiday
programme.desc: Au petit matin du 6 février 1978, le corps d'une jeune journaliste, Linda Lipnack Kuehl, a été découvert dans les rues de Washington D.C. La jeune femme avait consacré les dix dernières années de sa vie à retracer la véritable histoire de la chanteuse Billie Holiday. Dans ce cadre, elle avait enregistré des centaines d'heures d'interviews avec ses proches. Le livre n'a jamais été terminé et les bandes sont longtemps restées inutilisées. James Erskine est parvenu à les récupérer et a décidé de les utiliser comme support à un film sur la chanteuse. Outre la voix de Billie Holiday, on entend donc celles, notamment, de Count Basie, Louis Armstrong ou encore Tony Bennett.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: A Los Angeles, Lou Bloom, criminel qui vit d'expédients, découvre le travail des cameramen, à la recherche d'images explosives. Il s'en procure une et décide de se mettre à son compte. Ses moyens et son matériel sont très limités et ses premiers essais sont hasardeux mais Lou persévère. Il veut se faire une place dans le métier et impressionner Nina Romina, directrice de l'information de Channel 6, une chaine de télévision locale.

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
programme.desc: Quadragénaire, Cal vit depuis vingt-cinq ans avec sa femme Emily, qui lui a donné deux beaux enfants. Sa vie bascule le jour où il apprend que cette dernière l'a trompé. Cal décide de divorcer et devient un homme solitaire. Dans un bar, il rencontre Jacob, un séducteur professionnel qui accumule les conquêtes. Il accepte de prendre Cal sous son aile et de le transformer en don juan. Les résultats ne se font pas attendre.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: Caméléon domestique, Rango est tout sauf aventurier. Le hasard lui joue un mauvais tour et il se retrouve perdu au beau milieu du désert. Après avoir échappé de peu à un aigle, il fait la connaissance de Fève, une femelle lézard. Celle-ci vient d'une petite ville du Far West, Poussière, où elle emmène son nouvel ami. Rango décide de s'y faire passer pour un héros et impressionne les habitants, bien aidé par un heureux concours de circonstances. John, la vieille tortue maire du village, le nomme alors shérif. Il doit enquêter sur la pénurie d'eau qui assèche la ville.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Atteinte de troubles autistiques, la jeune Music vit avec sa grand-mère. S’échappant dans un monde de rêve, Music mène par ailleurs une existence pleine de rituels. Un jour, sa grand-mère meurt. La jeune fille est alors confiée à sa demi-soeur, Zu, une toxicomane récemment sortie de cure. Cette dernière ne sait pas bien comment s’y prendre et commet des maladresses. Lors d’une crise de Music, Ebo, un voisin, propose son aide à Zu. il sait comment calmer l’adolescente. Et Zu trouve un livre laissé par sa grand-mère qui détaille la routine quotidienne de Music.

programme.title: La princesse de Montpensier
programme.desc: En 1562, le roi Charles IX gouverne la France et les guerres de religion font rage. Marie de Mézières, amoureuse d'Henri, duc de Guise, est contrainte par son père d'épouser le prince de Montpensier. Son mari, appelé par le roi à rejoindre la guerre contre les protestants, la laisse en compagnie de son précepteur, le comte de Chabannes, loin du monde, au château de Champigny. La jeune femme, qui ne parvient pas à oublier le duc de Guise, devient malgré elle l’enjeu de passions auxquelles vient se mêler un autre soupirant, le duc d’Anjou, futur Henri III.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: L'homme au chat est passé à l'acte et assassiné son voisin. Se sentant coupable, Sheila décide d'agir et de ne plus obéir aux ordres de sa hiérarchie.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila, Jimmy prennent la direction du Paradis, une petit bourgade où les grands-parents du jeune homme tiennent du maison d'hôtes.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Dans la maison d'hôtes, Sheila doit faire face à la tentative de suicide de Gudz. Cet acte permet à Jimmy de comprendre l'origine de son propre trauma.

programme.title: 120 battements par minute
programme.desc: Au début des années 1990, Nathan participe pour la première fois à une assemblée de l'association Act Up Paris, qui milite pour les droits des séropositifs. Dès le premier soir, il se porte volontaire avec d'autres adhérents pour mener une action spectaculaire contre un laboratoire pharmaceutique. Nathan assiste ensuite à de nombreuses réunions où les échanges sont souvent musclés. Là, il rencontre Sean, à l'engagement et au discours particulièrement virulents. Après avoir distribué des tracts dans un lycée, ils tombent amoureux. Mais Sean est atteint du sida.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara Beasley, influenceuse de renom sur Internet, est sur le point de revenir son site à très bon prix à une firme. Ses manières égoïstes rendent la vie impossible à Evie, la nourrice de ses trois enfants.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara a fait des révélations à Nick qui pourraient bien empêcher la signature sur contrat juteux qu'elle doit signer avec la firme américaine. Le monde de Roxanne s'écroule quand Jordan est arrêté pour fraude.

programme.title: Une femme douce
programme.desc: Dans un village reculé Russie, une femme, déboutée par l'administration pénitentiaire, se voit retourner un colis qu'elle avait destiné quelques temps plus tôt à son mari incarcéré, à l’autre bout du pays, pour un crime qu'il n'a pas commis. Inquiète et désemparée, elle décide d’aller le porter elle-même à son époux. Mais, entre la mauvaise foi des fonctionnaires et la corruption des policiers, son parcours est semé d’embûches et d’humiliations. Arrivé au pénitencier, elle demande alors à voir son mari, mais personne ne peut lui dire où il se trouve.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A Hongkong, J.S. Cheung, officier de police spécialiste du déminage et des explosifs, a depuis longtemps infiltré le gang du redoutable Peng Hong, qui multiplie les braquages hautement préparés. Pour leur nouveau coup, les gangsters ont mis en place un dispositifs de taxis piégés, leur permettant de détourner l'attention des forces de l'ordre. Alors que les braqueurs sèment le chaos, Cheung, dans un de leurs véhicule, fait tout pour les empêcher de nuire. Ce faisant, il parvient à arrêter le jeune frère de Peng Hong alors que celui-ci parvient à prendre la fuite.

programme.title: American Pie : marions-les !
programme.desc: Sous le regard aimant de son papa, Jim s'est décidé à demander Michelle en mariage. Ravi que celle-ci ait accepté, il souhaite lui organiser une fête inoubliable. Mais le chemin jusqu'à l'autel s'annonce semé d'embuches pour le jeune homme. Entre son enterrement de vie de garçon avec ses amis illuminés, la présentation des deux familles et la pression du jour J, il va en voir de toutes les couleurs.

programme.title: American Pie 4
programme.desc: Treize ans après leur diplôme, Jim et ses amis ont bien changé. Le jeune homme est aujourd'hui marié avec Michelle. Ils ont un petit garçon et des obligations qui nuisent à leur vie sexuelle. Oz et Kevin sont également en couple alors que Finch cherche toujours le grand amour. Tous se réunissent le temps d'un week-end pour participer à une réunion d'anciens du lycée. Évidemment, l'encombrant Stifler ne tarde pas à débarquer.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: Pause
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Storm Boy
programme.desc: Homme d'affaires à la retraite, Michael Kingley rentre en Australie pour participer à un vote important de l'entreprise que gère désormais son fils et qui concerne un projet minier menaçant de polluer des terres. Sa petite-fille l'implore de ne pas voter en faveur. Une tempête interrompt la réunion qui est remise au lendemain. En parallèle, il est assailli de visions qui ont un lien avec son enfance. Petit garçon, il vivait sur une plage avec son père, entourée d'oiseaux sauvages. Un jour, il commence à prendre soin de bébés pélican dont les parents ont été abattus par des chasseurs.

programme.title: La jeune fille et son aigle
programme.desc: En Mongolie, Aisholpan, une jeune fille kazakh âgée de treize ans, tente de s'imposer en tant que dresseuse d'aigles royaux, un métier réservé aux hommes. Avec l'aide de son père, elle décide d'adopter un aigle pour en faire un chasseur de renards.

programme.title: Nicostratos le pélican
programme.desc: Sur une petite île grecque, Yannis, 14 ans, vit seul avec son père Démosthène, depuis le décès de sa mère. Un jour, en se rendant à Athènes, il achète un bébé pélican au commandant d'un bateau. Il décide de le garder et de l'élever, sans en parler à Démosthène. Quand ce dernier s'en aperçoit, leurs rapports, déjà conflictuels, se dégradent, et ce d'autant que l'oiseau devient vite une véritable célébrité sur l'île.

programme.title: Madagascar 2
programme.desc: Après avoir fui New York et échoué à Madagascar, Alex le lion, Marty le zèbre, Melman la girafe et Gloria l'hippopotame, parviennent à atteindre les plaines d'Afrique grâce à l'aide des pingouins, qui ont réparé l'épave d'un avion. Là, tous ont l'occasion de renouer avec leurs familles éloignées et leurs racines. Marty est comme un poisson dans l'eau, tandis qu'Alex, trop habitué au béton de la Grosse Pomme, ne retrouve pas ses instincts. Quant à la girafe, elle tente par tous les moyens d'avouer son amour à Gloria tandis que celle-ci est courtisée de toutes parts.

programme.title: Un peu, beaucoup, aveuglément
programme.desc: Une jeune pianiste, passionnée par son art mais peu sûre d'elle, s'installe enfin seule dans un appartement. Mais, dès la première nuit, d'étranges bruits l'effraient et la poussent à revenir chez Evguénie, son protecteur et professeur de piano. Le lendemain, elle persiste et découvre que son voisin le plus proche, un inventeur solitaire, voulait lui faire quitter son appartement. Entre les deux démarre une guerre sonore. Pourtant, bientôt, ils apprennent à se connaître.

programme.title: Les cobayes
programme.desc: Le laboratoire pharmaceutique Biothema vient de mettre au point un traitement, intitulé Ocy 36, qui influe sur les sentiments de ses sujets. Après plusieurs phases d'essais concluants, la laboratoire fait appel à des cobayes humains pour la dernière phase de tests. Adam, chercheur en sciences sociales, et Charlotte, cadre dans une grande entreprise, en couple depuis le lycée et parents d'un petit Basile, se portent volontaires, en espérant que ce traitement sauvera leur couple. Tous deux commencent le traitement, mais celui-ci ne montre pas de résultats immédiats.

programme.title: Le premier jour du reste de ta vie
programme.desc: Alors que Marie-Jeanne Duval est une maman douce, Robert, lui, est un père plutôt effacé, qui gagne sa vie comme chauffeur de taxi. Ensemble, ils ont deux fils et une fille : Albert, brillant mais colérique, Raphaël, un doux rêveur mélomane, et enfin Fleur, la benjamine révoltée. Sur une période d'une douzaine d'années, chacun des membres de cette famille, semblable à beaucoup d'autres, va vivre une journée qui marquera à jamais son existence. Ainsi, pour suivre des études de médecine, Albert s'installe dans un studio et fait la connaissance de sa voisine.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara Beasley, influenceuse de renom sur Internet, est sur le point de revenir son site à très bon prix à une firme. Ses manières égoïstes rendent la vie impossible à Evie, la nourrice de ses trois enfants.

programme.desc: Sara a fait des révélations à Nick qui pourraient bien empêcher la signature sur contrat juteux qu'elle doit signer avec la firme américaine. Le monde de Roxanne s'écroule quand Jordan est arrêté pour fraude.

Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: Jeune et golri
programme.sub-title: S1 E5 Les enfants ont toujours raison et les parents sont toujours ivres

programme.title: Jeune et golri
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 Le maitre et le caca

programme.title: Le dernier Vermeer
programme.desc: Le 29 mai 1945, trois semaines après la chute du Reich d'Hitler, des soldats américains découvrent dans un train un important chargement d'oeuvres d'art. Parmi elles, «Le Christ et la Femme adultère», un tableau du peintre flamand Johannes Vermeer. Enrôlé par l'armée canadienne, le capitaine Joseph Piller, juif d'origine néerlandaise, est chargé de retrouver les propriétaires des oeuvres spoliées ainsi que ceux qui les ont volées. L'officier s'intéresse plus particulièrement au tableau de Vermeer, apparemment vendu à Hermann Göring par Han Van Meegeren, un marchand d'art néerlandais.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.sub-title: Maigret et les sept petites croix

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Femmes de loi
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Une occasion en or

programme.title: Inspecteur Lewis
programme.sub-title: S4 E2 Vénus porteuse de mort

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.sub-title: S4 E6 Meurtre en modèle réduit

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.sub-title: S4 E7 Le trésor des Confédérés

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.sub-title: S5 E3 Le tombeau de la princesse inconnue

programme.title: Modern Murder : Quand viendra l'heure
programme.desc: Un collègue de Gorniak et Schnabel est retrouvé battu à mort au pied d'une cité. Les soupçons se portent sur son voisin de palier, Louis Bürger, un ancien détenu dont les empreintes sont retrouvées sur l'arme du crime. Clamant son innocence, Louis tente de s'enfuir avec son épouse, Anna, ainsi que leur fils de 12 ans, Tim, placé en foyer d'accueil..

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Peu avant sa mort, David Walker voulait retrouver celui qui avait abusé de lui dans son enfance. L'inspectrice Cassie Stuart recherche un violeur potentiel qui serait âgé de 80 ans environ. Jason Walker la sollicite et demande à voir son père à la morgue pour lui dire au revoir. James Gregory, restaurateur et ami de David, témoigne à son tour. Il révèle que les femmes, l'alcool et la drogue aidaient David à oublier sa honte d'avoir été victime d'agression sexuelle et de n'avoir rien dit à personne.

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Les enquêteurs poursuivent leurs investigations sur Colin, Sara et Marion. Cassie veut aussi savoir ce que Tessa a fait 48 heures avant la disparition de David Walker, son mari. Puis les policiers font une terrible découverte sur lui. Il était pédophile. Cassie décide d'étudier sa vie en profondeur pour savoir si des victimes ont voulu se venger. L'une d'elles témoigne et raconte que David organisa des réunions dans une maison entre des adultes et des mineurs entre 1981 et 1983.

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Jason en veut à Tessa, sa mère, d'avoir vécu avec un pédophile et quitte la maison. Sara cherche des preuves de son séjour en Italie pour consolider son alibi. Marion raconte à son mari comment son père a abusé d'elle dans son enfance et l'indifférence de sa mère quand elle le lui a révélé. A cause de cela, elle a fait quelque chose de terrible. De son côté, Colin promet à Simon qu'il n'a pas tué Walker, mais qu'il ne peut pas lui dire toute la vérité.

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Cassie est persuadée que Sara a été violée par David Walker et Colin et Marion par des personnes restant à identifier. Les trois victimes se sont connues dans un hôpital où elles ont été soignées et ont fomenté ensemble un plan pour se venger. Cassie rend visite au père de Colin à Glasgow puis à la mère de Marion, qui lui donnent de précieux indices. Enfin, elle recueille le témoignage de Colin. Il lui raconte avoir été violé par un ami de son père dès l'âge de 9 ans. Et que Sara et Marion ont vécu des choses bien pires.

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Tandis que la police enquête sur l'effraction qui a eu lieu au domicile de Faith, celle-ci se rend chez Cerys pour en savoir plus sur les relations qu'Evan entretenait avec les Glynn. La relation entre Faith et Steve devient plus intime, ce qui n'échappe pas au capitaine Williams qui demande à l'agent Jones de prendre Faith en filature..

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: La voiture d'Evan a été retrouvée sur un lieu connu pour le nombre de suicides élevés qui y sont commis. Mais aucune preuve ne laisse penser à un tel acte. Faith est à nouveau interrogée par la police, et Steve prend des risques pour l'aider..

programme.title: Meurtres à White House Farm
programme.desc: Après avoir fait une découverte capitale sur les lieux du crime, Stan et Mick sont de plus en plus persuadés de la culpabilité de Jeremy. Par ailleurs, Brett, un ami néo-zélandais arrive à la ferme, provoquant une vive tension entre Jeremy et Julie, sa petite amie. Ann se méfie de plus en plus de son cousin. Stan s'inquiète de voir les corps rendus à la famille. Si la crémation a lieu, des preuves pourraient bien être perdues à jamais..

programme.title: Truman
Truman – Der Mann, der Geschichte schrieb
programme.desc:
Truman: Directed by Frank Pierson. With Gary Sinise, Diana Scarwid, Richard Dysart, Colm Feore. Though considered unqualified, Harry S. Truman becomes the 33rd president following the April 1945 death of Franklin D. Roosevelt." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114738/","name":"Truman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI3ZmYwOGQtNTc3OC00YjhhLWFkNzQtNTZlNGFiODI1ODkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Though considered unqualified, Harry S. Truman becomes the 33rd president following the April 1945 death of Franklin D. Roosevelt.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114738/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mstomaso"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Imperfect but good biographical sketch","reviewBody":"Harry Truman was an American president of rare integrity. Steadfastly honest and loyal to his friends, his causes, and his own heart, and born into a lower middle class farming family, Truman stands out as a real anomaly in 20th century American politics. Like similar men of profound integrity, such as John Adams, his presidency was a turbulent time of great triumphs for freedom and democracy and huge problems for ethics, nationalism and human rights. And as the symbol and scapegoat of those times, Truman, again like Adams, played his role - whether cast as hero or villain - with profound dignity. This film tells his story from his enlistment in the armed forces during World War One, at the age of 33, to his retirement from politics about 35 years later.

The characters of this film are portrayed sensitively and authentically. Truman and his wife, and the controversial Generals Marshall and MacArthur are particularly impressive. In some cases - particularly the Trumans themselves - this must have been a fairly difficult effort. Truman was not a very dramatic and flashy person, and his wife was fairly detached and private. Sinise and Scarwid play the parts and the relationship perfectly.

Since the study of history is a big part of my career, I am writing from a slightly unusual perspective. "Truman" has all the pedigree for what should have been a really powerful biographical film - a great lead actor, a solid supporting cast, a good production team, a great story and a very strong writing team. And it is refreshing to see such an accurate portrayal of a true hero of American politics and such a vivid realization of his times. Despite all of this, I feel that Truman could have been a better film - more dramatic, more visually powerful and more poignant. Somewhere between the script and the directing, a bit of cinematic art was lost and never quite recovered. Historiographically, this is a satisfying film, but it does not go too far past "satisfying".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2331,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-09-09","keywords":"character name as title,douglas macarthur character,franklin d. roosevelt character,the white house,harry s. truman character","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000641/","name":"Gary Sinise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0769311/","name":"Diana Scarwid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0246004/","name":"Richard Dysart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682757/","name":"Frank Pierson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114242/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567184/","name":"David McCullough"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725564/","name":"Thomas Rickman"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

Roosevelt.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114738/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mstomaso","dateCreated":"2005-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Imperfect but good biographical sketch","reviewBody":"Harry Truman was an American president of rare integrity. Steadfastly honest and loyal to his friends, his causes, and his own heart, and born into a lower middle class farming family, Truman stands out as a real anomaly in 20th century American politics. Like similar men of profound integrity, such as John Adams, his presidency was a turbulent time of great triumphs for freedom and democracy and huge problems for ethics, nationalism and human rights. And as the symbol and scapegoat of those times, Truman, again like Adams, played his role - whether cast as hero or villain - with profound dignity. This film tells his story from his enlistment in the armed forces during World War One, at the age of 33, to his retirement from politics about 35 years later.

The characters of this film are portrayed sensitively and authentically. Truman and his wife, and the controversial Generals Marshall and MacArthur are particularly impressive. In some cases - particularly the Trumans themselves - this must have been a fairly difficult effort. Truman was not a very dramatic and flashy person, and his wife was fairly detached and private. Sinise and Scarwid play the parts and the relationship perfectly.

Since the study of history is a big part of my career, I am writing from a slightly unusual perspective. "Truman" has all the pedigree for what should have been a really powerful biographical film - a great lead actor, a solid supporting cast, a good production team, a great story and a very strong writing team. And it is refreshing to see such an accurate portrayal of a true hero of American politics and such a vivid realization of his times. Despite all of this, I feel that Truman could have been a better film - more dramatic, more visually powerful and more poignant. Somewhere between the script and the directing, a bit of cinematic art was lost and never quite recovered. Historiographically, this is a satisfying film, but it does not go too far past "satisfying".","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2331,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-09-09","keywords":"character name as title,douglas macarthur character,franklin d. roosevelt character,the white house,harry s. truman character","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000641/","name":"Gary Sinise","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0769311/","name":"Diana Scarwid","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0246004/","name":"Richard Dysart"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682757/","name":"Frank Pierson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114242/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567184/","name":"David McCullough","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725564/","name":"Thomas Rickman"],"duration":"PT2H15M"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 5923012, Title: Here and Now, --- Description: Here and Now: Created by Alan Ball. With Tim Robbins, Holly Hunter, Daniel Zovatto, Jerrika Hinton. A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5923012/","name":"Here and Now","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDIwOTg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAxMzc1NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 Americ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5923012/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"WorldProxy","dateCreated":"2020-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intriguing, Interesting, Well Written","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under (Alan Ball) brought me here. I was really disappointed it got cancelled. The characters were interesting, the stories were interesting, I enjoyed the social diversity and awareness of issues and how different groups reacted to everything. I liked the supernatural element and I'm a huge fan of Peter Macdissi. What I don't like is tricked out right-wingers who write reviews and are too stupid to understand that it's a TV show on HBO where you can have Gay, Muslim, Asian, Black, White, Latin, and homeless characters involved in relationships and have love for each other, but fail to mention the hate and racism of Nazi wannabe society, which by the way is a real problem in real life as well as in the show. If you're too sensitive and fragile for this sort of thing, then stick to whatever safe and insipid programs that appeal to your comfortable taste. Either that or shave your beard, lose the smelly red hat and grow a brain. I also think the show is self-aware, conscience, multi-layered, smart and definitely keeps you involved.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4733,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-02-11","keywords":"transvestite,racism,chlamydia,homophobia,progressivism","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000209/","name":"Tim Robbins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4683167/","name":"Daniel Zovatto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Premieres Tonight, 9/8c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1020377113","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A multi-racial family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Somalia, Vietnam and Colombia and one biological child, find their bonds tested when one of the children begins seeing things which the rest cannot."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"automation21","dateCreated":"2002-05-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entrancing, confronting, charming, absolutely mindbending. Feels like an insult to call it television","reviewBody":"And I rarely even watch television. I'm a book person.

Not since the "X-Files" has a TV show been so intriguing. Every time I watch an episode, I am struck back be depth of storyline, the intricate characters and the left-of-the-middle storytelling. I literally cannot control myself from discussing each new episode with (bored) family members.

SFU is a very introverted show - it resembles more a book or play than television. While the latter is extroverted and relies on events happening to characters (eg: the overboard emergencies of ER or the romances in soaps) to carry the story, Six Feet Under wants to communicate the deepest feelings and ideals of the people on screen. As a result, it not only stimulates the mind but also helps us analyse ourselves.

In the hands of any other creators, this would make for a very dull hour of suburban spirituality, but Allan Ball's menagerie of ghosts, (past characters influencing the present) trippy daydream sequences, surreal atmosphere and some wicked black humour make for a very entertaining show and sell what would otherwise be a marketing disaster to the masses. On top of that, every component from acting to directing to screenplay is flawless. (the dead boy's ghost in "a private life" still chills me to the bone).

Most, of all I admire the characters: some of the most complex and enchanting creatures ever to grace the idiot box. After a few episodes, they feel like a second family.

While I do have my complaints about the amount of obscenity, (I can swear that sometimes the writers want to offend us just for fun) I have to give my show the highest commendations. There are, of course, moments when I feel like throwing my chair at the television, but that is simply the consequence of watching a show that challenges me, rather than offer cheap amusement.

SFU may take a while to get into, but the rewards are bountiful.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127887,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Watchmen: Created by Damon Lindelof. With Regina King, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Tom Mison, Sara Vickers. Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7049682/","name":"Watchmen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhZDE3NjgtMjkzNC00NzI3LWJhOTItMWQ5ZjljODA5NWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MDI5NjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7049682/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"yoyopa"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Glad I took a chance on this one","reviewBody":"For the folks out there calling this show "Woke" you actually might be a racist. This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

I'm only a few episodes in but im hooked... all I ask is please Damon Lindelof... don't "Lost" us here.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-10-20","keywords":"dc comics,based on comic,superhero,based on comic book,superhero team","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005093/","name":"Regina King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5584344/","name":"Yahya Abdul-Mateen II"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2070427/","name":"Tom Mison"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038332/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Episode 3 Promo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi619298585","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Are you ready to venture into the great beyond? Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

IMDb data; ttnr: 7049682, Title: Watchmen, --- Description: Watchmen: Created by Damon Lindelof. With Regina King, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Tom Mison, Sara Vickers. Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7049682/","name":"Watchmen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhZDE3NjgtMjkzNC00NzI3LWJhOTItMWQ5ZjljODA5NWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MDI5NjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7049682/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yoyopa","dateCreated":"2019-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Glad I took a chance on this one","reviewBody":"For the folks out there calling this show "Woke" you actually might be a racist. This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

I'm only a few episodes in but im hooked... all I ask is please Damon Lindelof... don't "Lost" us here.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-10-20","keywords":"dc comics,based on comic,superhero,based on comic book,superhero team","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005093/","name":"Regina King","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5584344/","name":"Yahya Abdul-Mateen II","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2070427/","name":"Tom Mison"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038332/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Episode 3 Promo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi619298585","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Are you ready to venture into the great beyond? This movie indeed came out too early.

This movie not only shows us the pictures. But also the people behind them. What I love about Watchmen is that it's mature and basic study of how our society is structured. There's so many quotes that can be used in todays world. And with Zack Snyders visuals. It really blends well.

I gotta say. People calling this movie "boring" are the ones watching 4 movies a year. IMDb data; ttnr: 7049682, Title: Watchmen, --- Description: Watchmen: Created by Damon Lindelof. With Regina King, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Tom Mison, Sara Vickers. Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7049682/","name":"Watchmen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhZDE3NjgtMjkzNC00NzI3LWJhOTItMWQ5ZjljODA5NWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MDI5NjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7049682/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yoyopa","dateCreated":"2019-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Glad I took a chance on this one","reviewBody":"For the folks out there calling this show "Woke" you actually might be a racist. This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

I'm only a few episodes in but im hooked... all I ask is please Damon Lindelof... don't "Lost" us here.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-10-20","keywords":"dc comics,based on comic,superhero,based on comic book,superhero team","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005093/","name":"Regina King","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5584344/","name":"Yahya Abdul-Mateen II","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2070427/","name":"Tom Mison"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038332/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Episode 3 Promo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi619298585","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Are you ready to venture into the great beyond? IMDb data; ttnr: 0409459, Title: Watchmen, --- Description: Watchmen: Directed by Zack Snyder. With Malin Akerman, Billy Crudup, Matthew Goode, Jackie Earle Haley. In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0409459/","name":"Watchmen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2IzNGNiODgtOWYzOS00OTI0LTgxZTUtOTA5OTQ5YmI3NGUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0409459/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"tobbe_aik_9","dateCreated":"2019-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not your typical comicbook movie","reviewBody":"Christopher Nolan was right. This movie indeed came out too early.

This movie not only shows us the pictures. But also the people behind them. What I love about Watchmen is that it's mature and basic study of how our society is structured. There's so many quotes that can be used in todays world. And with Zack Snyders visuals. It really blends well.

I gotta say. People calling this movie "boring" are the ones watching 4 movies a year. IMDb data; ttnr: 7049682, Title: Watchmen, --- Description: Watchmen: Created by Damon Lindelof. With Regina King, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Tom Mison, Sara Vickers. Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7049682/","name":"Watchmen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhZDE3NjgtMjkzNC00NzI3LWJhOTItMWQ5ZjljODA5NWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MDI5NjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in an alternate history where masked vigilantes are treated as outlaws, Watchmen embraces the nostalgia of the original groundbreaking graphic novel of the same name, while attempting to break new ground of its own.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7049682/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yoyopa","dateCreated":"2019-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Glad I took a chance on this one","reviewBody":"For the folks out there calling this show "Woke" you actually might be a racist. This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

I'm only a few episodes in but im hooked... all I ask is please Damon Lindelof... don't "Lost" us here.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-10-20","keywords":"dc comics,based on comic,superhero,based on comic book,superhero team","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005093/","name":"Regina King","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5584344/","name":"Yahya Abdul-Mateen II","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2070427/","name":"Tom Mison"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038332/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Episode 3 Promo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi619298585","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Are you ready to venture into the great beyond? This show is not "Woke"... Charlies Angels was Woke. Dark Fate was Woke... Watchmen is just great storytelling with a diverse cast and poignant, rarely discussed historical topics.

Seriously, did anyone at any point during high school and college ever once bring up Tulsa 1921? No? Yea me neither.

This show isn't preaching at us and I really appreciate. For the first time in what feels like an eternity there is a strong female lead who is believable and doesn't need to tell us she's a strong female lead. She isn't some stupid Fing supermodel who looks cute holding a gun trying to make us believe her 105lb a$$ can beat up a grown man. THAT folks is woke horsesh**.

I haven't seen this many African American actors on one show/film this mainstream since Black Panther. I love it.

Regina King is truly fantastic and I'm so happy shes the face of something so mainstream.

I'm only a few episodes in but im hooked... all I ask is please Damon Lindelof... don't "Lost" us here.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105774,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-10-20","keywords":"dc comics,based on comic,superhero,based on comic book,superhero team","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005093/","name":"Regina King","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5584344/","name":"Yahya Abdul-Mateen II","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2070427/","name":"Tom Mison"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038332/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Episode 3 Promo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi619298585","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTUyZDctOTg4Yy00MTAwLTliZGUtZWMyNDkwMDM0MGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Are you ready to venture into the great beyond? programme.title: Hell on the Border
Hell on the Border
programme.desc: Hell on the Border: Directed by Wes Miller. With David Gyasi, Ron Perlman, Frank Grillo, Manu Intiraymi. Arkansas, 1875, After shooting 5 men to save a judge and then going into Indian Territory after a lethal outlaw, Bass Reeves becomes the first black deputy marshal west of Mississippi." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8652584/","name":"Hell on the Border","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzdiMDI0NDItMzdjOC00MzQwLWEwZGUtN2JjZDBkYmU3YjNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjA3MzE2ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Arkansas, 1875, After shooting 5 men to save a judge and then going into Indian Territory after a lethal outlaw, Bass Reeves becomes the first black deputy marshal west of Mississippi.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8652584/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"daithiosioradain"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lame amateurish production unworthy of the true story","reviewBody":"Where to start with the issues? Buildings with beautifully fresh and smoothly sawn walls, houses with aluminium roofs, six shooters that didn't need reloading, disjointed action sequences moving at glacial speeds...... Camerawork was crude, used jerkiness and lens flare etc to no benefit. One of the worst films I've seen in the last year, this was inconsistent, uneven, unrealistic and frankly has nothing to commend it except that it chose a story that should be told. Avoid.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1337,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Biography","Western"],"datePublished":"2019-12-13","keywords":"shooting,shooting a gun into the air,n word,fort smith arkansas,public execution","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hell On The Border","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2369634073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzNzIyYmMtN2YwYy00ZGZkLTkwNDctY2RkMDk1ZDBjYWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEzNzIyYmMtN2YwYy00ZGZkLTkwNDctY2RkMDk1ZDBjYWM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1408543/","name":"David Gyasi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000579/","name":"Ron Perlman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342029/","name":"Frank Grillo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5090040/","name":"Wes Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0439538/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0333376/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0817147/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5090040/","name":"Wes Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Open Range
Open Range – Weites Land
programme.desc: Open Range: Directed by Kevin Costner. With Robert Duvall, Kevin Costner, Annette Bening, Michael Gambon. A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0316356/","name":"Open Range","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyNjA4NTY3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjc0MDM3._V1_.jpg","description":"A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0316356/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alanmcaras"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"I like this movie","reviewBody":"I've seen this movie at least ten times. I watch it whenever I stumble across it scheduled on a cable channel. I think it is the best movie Kevin Costner has ever made. I would not call myself a big Kevin Costner fan. I think he too often over reaches. This movie however he nailed. Duval is positively superb. I do not recall Duval ever bad, well except maybe his brief turn in To Kill a Mockingbird. I am not enough of a movie buff to be able attribute his performance in this film to Costner's direction or Duval's feel for the character. I cannot recall Costner ever playing a role as subtlety as he does in this. I think he understood this character and was willing to share the screen with his costars. I give MS Benning huge props for playing this film without apparent makeup. All credit to Costner for the mood of this movie never wavering. The cinematography was excellent.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70224,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-02-18","keywords":"19th century,cattle,violence,showdown,crooked marshal","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000126/","name":"Kevin Costner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000380/","name":"Robert Duvall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0526019/","name":"Diego Luna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000126/","name":"Kevin Costner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008653/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097246/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0656842/","name":"Lauran Paine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0998086/","name":"Craig Storper"}],"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="

I watch it whenever I stumble across it scheduled on a cable channel. I think it is the best movie Kevin Costner has ever made. I would not call myself a big Kevin Costner fan. I think he too often over reaches. This movie however he nailed. Duval is positively superb. I do not recall Duval ever bad, well except maybe his brief turn in To Kill a Mockingbird. I am not enough of a movie buff to be able attribute his performance in this film to Costner's direction or Duval's feel for the character. I cannot recall Costner ever playing a role as subtlety as he does in this. I think he understood this character and was willing to share the screen with his costars. I give MS Benning huge props for playing this film without apparent makeup. All credit to Costner for the mood of this movie never wavering. John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099423/","name":"Die Hard 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzMzYzk3ZTEtZDg0My00MTY5LWE3ZmQtYzNhYjhjN2RhZGRjL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099423/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"axlrhodes"},"dateCreated":"2008-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A solid sequel","reviewBody":"Like the Lethal Weapon films of the late 80's and early 90's i found the Die Hard films to be very satisfying action entertainment.Much seems to be made of this sequel being inferior to its predecessor but i thought that it matched Die Hard for scale and has some breathtaking moments of action.Bruce Willis is still on top form as our hero and the airport setting during the busy Christmas period gives the film a positive buzz and a certain sense of hyperactivity.Although the film is missing a villain as much fun as Alan Rickmans Hans Gruber,William Sadler is nonetheless bad enough to hate and actually turns out a lot more ruthless than Gruber.In summary director Renny Harlin has succeeded in making a quick paced film that retains the sense of scale felt in the first film whilst making the most of Bruce Willis comic timing and action man charisma. 8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":349022,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1990-07-03","keywords":"john programme.title: The Perfect Storm
Der Sturm
programme.desc: The Perfect Storm: Directed by Wolfgang Petersen. With George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, John C. Reilly, Diane Lane. An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0177971/","name":"The Perfect Storm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGU2MWRiYmQtMDY1MS00OTUzLTkzYTktYjE5YTE4MTI0NzRkL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0177971/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DR.Z"},"dateCreated":"2000-07-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A roller coaster ride on water","reviewBody":"I was struck by the documentary quality of this film, and couldn't help but look back to an earlier Peterson film, Das Boot, where we got up close and intimate with all the crew of the submarine--where they slept, went to the washroom, their soaking wet clothes, the damp, the stink of unwashed clothes, the claustrophobia on board. I had absolutely no trouble believing that Mark Wahlberg and Clooney were fishermen, trying to earn a hardscrabble living against a tough and unforgiving sea. The movie even starts slowly, giving the viewers insights into their lives at home, why they fish, and why they make the decisions later on in the movie. Then the film starts to slowly build the tension as the storm builds in strength. The special effects were absolutely believable, and Peterson piles on the tension even while breaking it up by adding a parallel rescue at the same time as the Andrea Gail begins to run into trouble. An excellent summer thriller that is a real roller coaster ride--literally and figuratively--on water."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":162457,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-06-30","keywords":"fish,fishing,sea,death,seastorm","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Perfect Storm","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi737673497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWYxN2NjMWUtMjc4Ni00YjdmLTkxZDAtOWFlYzVhNGZkMDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWYxN2NjMWUtMjc4Ni00YjdmLTkxZDAtOWFlYzVhNGZkMDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000242/","name":"Mark Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000604/","name":"John C. Reilly"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000583/","name":"Wolfgang Petersen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094884/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005233/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0432631/","name":"Sebastian Junger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937074/","name":"William D. I had absolutely no trouble believing that Mark Wahlberg and Clooney were fishermen, trying to earn a hardscrabble living against a tough and unforgiving sea. The movie even starts slowly, giving the viewers insights into their lives at home, why they fish, and why they make the decisions later on in the movie. Then the film starts to slowly build the tension as the storm builds in strength. The special effects were absolutely believable, and Peterson piles on the tension even while breaking it up by adding a parallel rescue at the same time as the Andrea Gail begins to run into trouble. An excellent summer thriller that is a real roller coaster ride--literally and figuratively--on water.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":162457,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-06-30","keywords":"fish,fishing,sea,death,seastorm","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Perfect Storm","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi737673497","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWYxN2NjMWUtMjc4Ni00YjdmLTkxZDAtOWFlYzVhNGZkMDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWYxN2NjMWUtMjc4Ni00YjdmLTkxZDAtOWFlYzVhNGZkMDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000242/","name":"Mark Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000604/","name":"John C. programme.desc:

Feature film based on the video game by Capcom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6475714/","name":"Monster Hunter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGU3NTFmNjYtODc3Ny00MWEzLWI3M2ItZjE3NDgwMTI0MzkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"When Cpt. Feature film based on the video game by Capcom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6475714/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dave-06306"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun film ruined by the editing, again.","reviewBody":"As everyone else has mentioned its an fun monster adventure with a very likeable cast, plenty of action and decent effects.

But just like the last Resident Evil film its horribly over edited by director Paul W. S. Anderson and editor Doobie White who seem intent on using a style that nearly everyone in the audience hates.

A shame really, looks like they made a solid action monster movie and ruined it in Post.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49223,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2020-12-04","keywords":"based on video game,parallel world,female soldier,written by director,military","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi638763289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmEyM2JkN2ItNmQ3NS00ZTkzLWEwMjYtZmU1YmJlODczZWM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmEyM2JkN2ItNmQ3NS00ZTkzLWEwMjYtZmU1YmJlODczZWM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Behind our world, there is another: a world of dangerous and powerful monsters that rule their domain with deadly ferocity. When an unexpected sandstorm transports Captain Artemis (Milla Jovovich) and her unit (TI Harris, Meagan Good, Diego Boneta) to a new world, the soldiers are shocked to discover that this hostile and unknown environment is home to enormous and terrifying monsters immune to their firepower. In their desperate battle for survival, the unit encounters the mysterious Hunter (Tony Jaa), whose unique skills allow him to stay one step ahead of the powerful creatures. As Artemis and Hunter slowly build trust, she discovers that he is part of a team led by the Admiral (Ron Perlman). Facing a danger so great it could threaten to destroy their world, the brave warriors combine their unique abilities to band together for the ultimate showdown."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1388074/","name":"Tony Jaa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000579/","name":"Ron Perlman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. programme.title: Unknown
Unknown Identity
programme.desc: Unknown: Directed by Jaume Collet-Serra. With Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger, January Jones, Aidan Quinn. When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1401152/","name":"Unknown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA4NTk3MTQwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjUwMTMxNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1401152/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"smith-sherrie22"},"dateCreated":"2012-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lliam is great","reviewBody":"Multiple people have compared this to Neeson's 2008 release of "Taken." Both have a similar concept; Liam goes on a fast-paced journey to retrieve something special that has been taken from him. This time it is not his daughter; it is his mind. Unlike "Taken," "Unknown" is more of a suspense mystery than an action flick. There are some chases and fight scenes, but that is not the main focus. The movie's plot is focus and it is unique for it is unpredictable. We are confused like Neeson's character and there are times we don't know if he will succeed. There are multiple twists and unlike most mystery thrillers, it took me more than half through the film to figure it all out.\n\nIn short, "Unknown" is a fairly decent mystery thriller. Good performances. Good story for a mystery. Good music. Good cinematography—I particularly like the whole gray, dreary atmosphere that reflects the film's location's bleak weather. Good twists. Good suspense— the sound mixers must've had a kick in adding emphasis on sound effects to startle the audience. The one thing I will note is that Liam Neeson is really showing his age. This is not necessarily a bad thing; on the contrary, it helps his character out. It gets tiresome that Hollywood always uses the generic 30-something year old actor with smashing abs who is tossed into a terrible situation. It is nice to see an aging actor play an upper middle-aged man who has perhaps lost his mind while running away from people trying to kill him.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":256380,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-03-23","keywords":"amnesia,coma,airport,scientist,nurse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unknown: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1552980505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1208167/","name":"Diane Kruger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005064/","name":"January Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429471/","name":"Jaume Collet-Serra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050870/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124700/","name":"Oliver Butcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180508/","name":"Stephen Cornwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0885857/","name":"Didier Van Cauwelaert"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="
